definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Some vessels turned back to be acute angles and some were observed as blind channels.
sentences.chinese: 毛细血管部分成锐角折返，亦可见毛细血管盲端。

sentences.english: Sharp corners are stress-risers in the forgings, as well as make the dies weak in service.
sentences.chinese: 锐角会增加锻件中的应力，同时在使用时削弱锻模。

sentences.english: The ramp sits at an acute angle to deflect the intake airstream from the longitudinal direction.
sentences.chinese: 这个斜面锐角使进气口的气流纵向流变。

sentences.english: The sharp-edged triangle poking out of the flat ocean was in fact the tip of a shipwreck.
sentences.chinese: 在海平面上突出的锐角三角形实际上是一条渔船。

sentences.english: The spade coins shaped acute angle of Three Jin states should be the legal currency made by Han state.
sentences.chinese: 三晋锐角布中的涅金布当是韩国铸造的法定流通货币。

sentences.english: ANGLE OF INCIDENCE, The acute angle which the wing chord makes with the longitudinal axis of the aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 安装角，飞机的纵轴与机翼弦线所形成的锐角。

sentences.english: We must bestir ourselves to get there on time.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到锐角精确的三等分。

sentences.english: The acute angle theorem is extended under the condition of the variational structure.
sentences.chinese: 在具有变分结构条件下推广了锐角原理。
